name: Doubletree Suites by Hilton Naples

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here at the end of December. We were pleased with what we got - it is a two room suite, though that second room is somewhat small - a couch, nice sized TV on a dresser, and a table with two seats squeezed in. A refrigerator and wet bar are included. The bathroom was nicely decorated and clean. Our bedroom had a pillowtop mattress - so comfortable - and another large TV on a dresser. The only problem with the bedroom set-up was there was only one side table near the bed, and very little room to access the other side of the bed (it was against the window). There is a nice pool - good size, though we didn't get a chance to use it.
reviews.title: Good Value for the Naples Area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a small restaurant that serves menu items for breakfast or a small buffet. It's right at the lobby area, so it was always busy with people coming and going, often with luggage. This was an older hotel that seemes to have been acquired by Doubletree and somewhat updated. The hallways were a bit older in style and the one elevator was slow and cumbersome. But for expensive Naples, it was a decent value.
reviews.title: Worth the #1 rating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: A real bright spot here is the staff - everyone is friendly and helpful. The manager really went out of her way to make sure things went well for us. And whenever we wanted (not just at check-in), we were given those warm, wonderful, chocolate-chip cookies. We'd stay here again.
reviews.title: Best Hilton property we've stayed at

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have become a Hilton brand fan...
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean, quiet, service oriented and of course the excellent warm cookies on arrival and on request.
reviews.title: Will go back again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at the hotel are very friendly and helpful. The place is very clean. They honored our request for a special room and it was ready when we got there a little early.The only negative would be the air conditioner unit is in a closet in the bedroom and was noisy going on and off during the night. If you are a light sleeper this could be a problem. Otherwise, this is a very nice hotel for the money and would recommend it.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: I travel weekly for business and this is my hotel of choice when I am in Naples. The staff is always very accommodating if anything is needed. The interior of the hotel is always clean and well kept and the grounds are consistently kept in beautiful condition. i would recommend this property whether for business of family stay.
reviews.title: Naples Doubletree

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Excellent location and stay. Very friendly staff, clean facilities and excellent accomodations. Would stay at this property in the future and would highly recommend to others. Great price value. Breakfast arrangements worked extremely well. Overall a great stay.
reviews.title: Leisure Traveller

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013
reviews.text: It was our third stay at Doubletree and it was a very pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Great nine days
GREAT HOTEL WITH HELPFUL FRIENDLY STAFF
reviews.text: The room was very clean, comfortable and nice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013
reviews.text: Went for a quick getaway with a couple friends. Stayed in a suite overlooking pool area. Room was clean, comfortable, nicely decorated and a balcony to boot. Refrigerator to chill our wine while we relaxed. Nice happy hour in lobby and delicious breakfast with made to order omelets and fresh muffins. Quick and inexpensive cab ride to restaurants, bars, shops and beach. Most of all, the customer service..... Every staff member was more than welcoming, pleasant and always smiling. Plan on staying there again, very soon !!!
reviews.title: Star Treatment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: This hotel has excellent accommodations at very reasonable rates. The staff is friendly and courteous. Hope is very friendly and accommodating. You feel welcome from the moment you walk through the lobby. The rooms are spacious, the bedding is very comfortable. The pool is clean and warm. Restaurant is clean and reasonably priced. Restaurant staff scrambles to meet your every need. The breakfast buffet is excellent and you can also order a cooked to order breakfast. Lots to see and do in this area and this hotel is great place to start.
reviews.title: Excellent all around

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed it this Facility at least 6 times and it just keeps getting better. Located in Bonita Springs between Naples, FL downtown and Coconut Point shopping Mall in Estero, FL there is easy access to beaches, shopping, and great food. What more can a person ask for. The Pool area has been updated with new lighting and an abundance of lounge chairs and plenty of towels. 5 Stars all the way............we are going back for a stay in August Thank you
reviews.title: Can't Get Better Than This

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband wanted to take me away for my birthday - we decided on Naples ! The girl I spoke to when I phoned to book was extremely helpful - however my Hilton Rewards Card wasn't "recognized" so I had to get a new one - there goes my points !!The Receptionist at the Hotel was also very nice and helpful and we got warm cookies !The room was spacious a nice seating area, a fridge, coffee maker etc but our view from the window was a hedge ! even though I had, at booking, told them this was a significant birthday treat !!As we were late in arriving we ate pizza by the pool which was delicious !The bed was extremely spacious and comfortable, the air conditioner was noisy !The bathroom was small but adequate. We had a great choice of items to choose from for breakfast and my husband got to chat with one of the waiters - why we were there etc - and he brought me out a slice of chocolate cake, which was fabulous !and a good start to any day.
reviews.title: Birthday Treat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One of the downsides to the hotel is its location, quite a distance from Naples about a 20 minute drive. We spent most of the day exploring and headed back to the hotel to enjoy the pool facilities before heading out for dinner. Very nice hotel, we would stay there again if it was closer to Naples !
reviews.title: Excellent Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My Wife & I just spent 2 weeks in this great hotel & had a wonderful time.
reviews.title: Hard to fault it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: All of the facilities were as described & the staff were all very good too.
reviews.title: Hard to beat. good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were in suite 245 & it was worth paying the extra for the additional space.
reviews.title: Why should you stay here? Let me count the reasons...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restaurant service was variable at best but this was the only downside.
reviews.title: Exceptional Service; Great Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Would recommend this to hotel to one & all.
reviews.title: Great, Family-Friendly Bargain

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the third Doubletree I've stayed at and each time I've been pleasantly surprised. They know service! The room we had looks like it was a handicapped suite, but it was very spacious! I enjoyed the Crabtree & Evelyn bath products and sheets/bedding were wonderful. Other nice surprises included complimentary bottled water every day in the room and of course, their free warm cookies.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Our reservation also included continental breakfast which was in their small dining area with waitstaff that poured fresh coffee and provided orange juice at the table. Food was buffet but was served on nice dishes with local marmalade and homemade granola. All food was fresh. For an extra $5 you could also purchase the warm buffet which included eggs, meats, etc.
reviews.title: Awesome stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Naples

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For the beach, they also provided free chair rental and towels to take with you. Although I didn't use it, the pool looked lovely and they also had a small seating area outside with a flat screen TV which was nice too.
reviews.title: A Little Jewel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The property is a little distance from downtown Naples, but close to Walmart, Whole Foods, and other shopping, and close to a beach. If you're looking for a nice, clean, friendly place to stay for a couple of nights, I would highly recommend the Doubletree,
reviews.title: Back Again and Pleasantly Surprised

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: I recently stayed at the Doubletree by Hilton Naples with a couple of high school friends for a birthday week! Hope at the front desk took really good care of us and was always friendly and cheerful. Xiomara our housekeeper made sure we had enough towels for 3 ladies. We saw the GM on Saturday morning and she was so friendly and helpful. You know she leads by example. Thank you Doubletree for a great week!
reviews.title: Amazing Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel staff was very friendly. Front desk and concierge were very helpful. We had brochures to every golf course in the area and updates on current events.
reviews.title: One last golf trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lying at a beautiful location north of busy downtown Naples, overlooking the Cocohatchee River, Doubletree Guest Suites offers a pristine facility and brilliant service. Concierge staff (RobinJill, especially, and Joanne) provided above-and-beyond assistance in identifying, scheduling and arranging gastronomic and fishing events and in helping family assemble a special party tray to celebrate an 80th birthday. The combination of a better than first-class boutique hotel and a hospitable, comfortable city made for a vacation of a lifetime, easily comparable to cruising on a luxury yacht, a la Seabourne, Crystal, etc. And the numerous choc-chip cookie treats were an added plus.
reviews.title: Best Doubletree ever, anywhere!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This is our second stay at the DoubleTree Naples on Tamiami Trail. It is a great location close to shops as well as the beach. The staff was very accomodating giving us towels and chairs to use at the beach, recommending restaurants, and having our room cleaned early when we needed it. There was always fresh apples, cookies upon check in, and light snacks later in the day. The pool area is nice but not fancy. We plan on staying here again.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent a week there and it was very nice. The location on was great on US 41. The people who work there were great and very helpful. The breakfast was good but it was the same thing everyday like another person wrote. The pool area was clean and the water temp was good. The only thing I wished I had reserved was a room with a balcony.
reviews.title: Great Location, Nice people

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent Value for Money , Large Rooms. Good pool , Pleasant staff, good breakfast All round good value
reviews.title: Good Location , Excellent Staff ,

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 4 nights at this hotel. Breakfasts offered good variety, cookies excellent, staff pleasant, room size most ample. However we felt the walls were paper thin, as we could very easily hear the chatter of our neighbors next door. We missed having a close-up mirror, something we usually find in other Hilton family properties. Although the location was convenient for driving places, the property itself was well maintained but unremarkable.
reviews.title: Very nice but not a Wow

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from a five day stay at this hotel. We couldn't have asked for a better experience. As others have commented, the staff couldn't have been nicer and more helpful whether they were from the front desk , the restaurant ,or housekeeping. We were given beach chairs, umbrellas and towels and lots of good advice as to where to eat. The suite was very pleasant with a good size balcony. Since we booked late, we weren't able to get a room overlooking the river (which I would recommend) but one overlooking the pool which was a good second choice. The pool was a decent size not like some hotels we have stayed in with lots of chaises with both shaded and sunny areas. Great for a dunk after a hot day. The hotel is in a nice area of Naples within only a couple of miles of excellent beaches, and about 7 easy drive miles to downtown Naples.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We stayed at the Doubletree for 2 nights and we have nothing but great things to say about our stay. The front desk staff, the management and the housekeepers were so friendly and helpful. We were heading to the beach for the day, they offered us compimentary beach chairs and towels to take with us. Everyone went out of their way to make us feel welcomed!
reviews.title: Great friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We stayed here for just 2 nites. The rooms are ever so nice and roomy. The staff couldn't have been friendlier and the cookies were the best!! We loved the pool area. The temperature of the pool was so comfortable. We would stay again and again.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Upon check-in we were welcomed with genuinely friendly, smiling front desk agents who were not distracted by telephone calls or employees competing for attention. Pre-registration made it easy for speedy room access as filing was readily on hand at the desk. We had the feeling they were waiting for us.
reviews.title: Doubletree Hilton Outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011
reviews.text: This is the best Doubletree I've found. It is a step above other hotel in this chain. The hotel is new, well designed and very well appointed. We had a beautiful suite with a view of the pool. The service was top notch. The front desk was helpful and friendly despite a busy day. The kids loved the pool and we enjoyed the fitness center. Overall it was a delight.
reviews.title: Just great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in two different suites over 19 days. The first, with a river view, had a large balcony and good layout. We would have remained in this room if it had been available when we decided to extend our stay. The second suite had a poolview.
reviews.title: Great staff, rooms, location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were clean, nicely furnished and of a good size for two people. Beds were comfortable. Although close to a major street (Tamiami), the rooms were quiet. The pool area was good for sun-tanning, although we found the water in the pool too warm.
reviews.title: OK, but not as good as I expected from the reviews.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011
reviews.text: The location was great for us -- near beautiful beaches (Delnor-Wiggins and Clam Pass), the Museum of Art, and excellent shopping (Waterside Shops and the Mercato). Also a reasonable drive to Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary which was one highlight of our first trip to Florida. Some travellers may prefer to be closer to the centre of Naples, but the short drive there to visit galleries or restaurants was not an issue for us.
reviews.title: Expectations met and exceeded.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service was excellent -- everyone was friendly and helpful from the front desk to the cleaning staff. Special mention must be made of RobinJill Hochmeyer, the concierge, who made helpful suggestions about activities in the area and restaurants and made reservations for us. She did everything she could to make our stay enjoyable.
reviews.title: The Best Hotel staff from top to newest person!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for a week in January and found the stay comfortable and affordable. The service we received during our stay was excellent. Everyone was friendly and wanted to make the stay the best it could be.
reviews.title: Good Value for the Money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel is a bit worn and could use some updating but the rooms were clean and adequate. We stayed in a suite with a nice view of the pool. The beds were comfortable. On the down side the fitness room was joke. Breakfast was ok but was the same thing everyday. Would have been nice to add a muffin one day and maybe a donut another but for families it would do.
reviews.title: Delightful
lovely hotel
reviews.text: Having read all the reviews we were extremely pleased with our suite and our stay, the hotel has an air of calm about it and we look forward to staying again very soon.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cookies wow!
reviews.title: Good value for money; friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was my first time at the Doubletree and I will definately stay here again when visiting Naples. The hotel is clean, in a great location in North Naples, close to the beach, and the staff is wonderful and very welcoming. The fitness room is more than adequate. The breakfast is delicious. They have wonderful cookies available all day plus snacks in the bar along with coffee and tea all day. The rooms are spacious and the beds are very comfortable. I highly recommend this hotel and look forward to a return visit soon!
reviews.title: Lovely and clean, Good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the moment we arrived we felt very welcome. The staff at the registration desk were positive, cheerful, and obviously proud of "their" hotel. The server in the bar was very friendly and took time to explain the menu to us. Throughout our stay every staff member we met in the halls smiled and said "hello". Everyone seemed to enjoy working at the hotel. Their attitude made us feel very comfortable and "at home".
reviews.title: Outstanding Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room and the halls were very clean. The bed was very comfortable - among the best mattress we have ever had in a hotel. The warm chocolate chip cookies were a delightful treat when we returned to the hotel each evening. For us, the location was very convenient for exploring historic downtown Naples and the west coast from Marcos Island to Fort Myers.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel & Service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Our reservation was for two nights, but we enjoyed the hotel so much that we extended our reservation and stayed another two nights!
reviews.title: Customer Service was excellent and hotel was wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: This hotels staff was absolutely the friendliest I have ever encountered at a hotel. The guy at the front desk and the lady at the restaurant/bar were wonderful! And the fresh baked cookies they give you when you check in, AMAZING!! I highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Meeting facilities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel in the past; when I checked in for this last stay my room was located on the first floor which I do not prefer; my profile (since I am a frequent traveler) has alwas been that I prefer a room on a higher level. I had also requested a room with a balcony (which I understood may not be available); the room on the first floor did not have a balcony. Shortly after I got to my room the front desk employee (Andrea Maher) located another room for me on a higher level with a small balcony; again, since I travel frequently for business it was wonderful to see such great customer service.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with all amenities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Fantastic place. Food at breakfast quick and high quality items with fruit and oatmeal. In an d out in 10 minutes with a hot breakfast. Room is bigger than most and very comfortable ameneties. Will be staying there again and again. Cannot beat the location and the people. Very helpful and courteous.
reviews.title: Great experiecne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The facility was very clean, up-to-date with nice accommodations. Would recommend to anyone for a first visit to the city or returning again. Had a very pleasant stay. The location is off a main route but still has the appeal of being out of the way. Poolside was the view we had and worth the few extra dollars.
reviews.title: Double Tree Visit Naples

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location of hotel since it was our first time coming to Naples. It was very close to Tin City where there are great little shops and resturants. The restaurant next door was good too. Would definitely stay here again when I come back to Naples. Staff was hospitable. Enjoyed the amenities and the amazing view from our room.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel staff was excellent especially the front desk ,Robin, and the housekeeper,Betty. The hotel is clean and everyone is friendly and helpful. We had a wonderful week of vacation time here and recommend this hotel to everyone. I have stayed here in the past and will come back as soon as possible. This hotel has it all.
reviews.title: perfect location for a vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I felt comfortable enough to walk around in my room in my bare feet. Enough said. Very clean, good service. Close to the beach. Warm cookies, quiet. Would stay here again. Great price from trip advisor too.
reviews.title: Great hotel, very clean and safe, good service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife & I had a very pleasant stay for nine nights. The suites are comfortable and well equipped for most needs, the restaurant in the hotel was very good as well - especially for breakfast. The front desk personnel were great and displayed very professional attitudes - highly recommend.
reviews.title: Post Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this hotel to celebrate my 40th birthday. I chose it because nearly all of the reviews were very favorable and it was the top rated hotel in the area. I was not disappointed! This was one of my favorite hotel stays. The staff was just wonderful. I was welcomed warmly with a handshake by Hope, who is just always smiling and so friendly. Check-in was very quick, because all of the paperwork was ready and waiting. The cookies we received were delicious and available anytime I asked (which was a lot :-)). The room was very comfortable and quiet, as well as spotless. Anytime we requested anything from Housekeeping, it was sent quickly without delay. Also, the TV in the living room wasn't working when we arrived. We were going to let the front desk know on our way out for dinner, but on our way back to the lobby we ran into the Engineering manager, and one of the engineers. As soon as we told them, they were on it right away. I had to go back to the room for something and he was already in there fixing it, mere minutes after we talked about it. We purchased the beach package since we were so close to the beach, and it was well worth it. The staff made sure we had our chairs and umbrella for the beach, and Robin Jill even cleaned the chairs when for us when she discovered that the previous guest had not done so. In honor of my birthday, I received a bottle of champagne with a personalized card, which was just lovely. Hope also recommended the Watermark Grille for my birthday dinner, which was a great choice as they have the best steak and seafood. Check-out was a breeze as well. We were given more cookies for the road and the lady at the front desk that day even printed out our boarding passes for us. I wish I could remember her name as well, but she was very nice. The trip was just wonderful and a lot of that was because of the awesome staff at the Doubletree. We will definitely stay there again if we are in the area. I cant sing their praises enough!
reviews.title: Great Weekend at the Doubletree in Naples

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service here was GREAT! There was a lady named Hope that worked the front desk and we just loved her. She was so helpful with a great personality. They offer fresh cookies at the front desk that must be tried. The rooms were nice, clean, large and get very dark when sleeping in.
reviews.title: Loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an exceptional property, you will not be disappointed. Extremely clean, excellent staff, the rooms are very nicely appointed, great breakfast all just minutes to the beach. This keeps the feeling of a smaller hotel, if you are looking for a high rise with tons of people this is not the place, it's nice and relaxing. I have absolutely no complaints what so ever.
reviews.title: Naples Florida

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about our stay at this hotel. Having a suite was wonderful when we had 2 rain days. Our bathroom was pristine and it was nice they gave you an option to schedule your room service so you could plan accordingly. While this may not be the most glamorous hotel in Naples, you will not want for a thing especially after all those dollars you save.
reviews.title: Amazing Value

aka: Doubletree Suites By Hilton Naples Hotel
description: Located on the Cocohatchee River and Nature Preserve, just two miles from the white sandy beaches of the Gulf of Mexico, the award-winning Doubletree Suites by Hilton Naples offers 101 one-bedroom suites, two restaurants, riverside heated pool, 24-hour business center, 24-hour fitness center, complimentary high-speed wireless Internet Access and 2,300 square feet of flexible meeting space.
